title: goinstall: better error for paths beginning with http://
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
At installing a package via 'goinstall', it should make the subdirectories when they
doesn't exist.


$ goinstall http://github.com/kless/go-strings-build/src
goinstall: http://github.com/kless/go-strings-build/src: open
/var/tmp/go/src/pkg/http:/github.com/kless/go-strings-build/src: no such file or
directory
